mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ROOMS ( ROOM_NO, CAMP_NO, ROOM_TYPE_NO, ROOM_NAME, ROOM_DESC, ROOM_PRICE ) VALUES ( SEQ_RNO.NEXTVAL, 1, #{roomTypeNo}, #{roomName}, #{roomDesc}, #{roomPrice} )
INSERT INTO ROOM_IMG ( IMG_NO, ROOM_NO, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, FILE_LEVEL ) VALUES ( SEQ_RINO.NEXTVAL, SEQ_RNO.CURRVAL, #{originName}, #{changeName}, #{fileLevel} )
mapper.select: SELECT ROOM_NO roomNo, CAMP_NO campNo, ROOM_TYPE_NAME roomTypeName, ROOM_NAME roomName, ROOM_DESC roomDesc, TO_CHAR(ROOM_PRICE, '999,999,999') price, COUNT, ROOMS.STATUS status FROM ROOMS JOIN ROOM_TYPE USING (ROOM_TYPE_NO) WHERE ROOMS.STATUS = 'N'
SELECT ROOM_NO roomNo, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName, FILE_LEVEL fileLevel FROM ROOMS JOIN ROOM_IMG USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE FILE_LEVEL = 1

SELECT ROOM_NO roomNo, CAMP_NO campNo, ROOM_TYPE_NAME roomTypeName, ROOM_NAME roomName, ROOM_DESC roomDesc, ROOM_PRICE roomPrice, TO_CHAR(ROOM_PRICE, '999,999,999') price, COUNT, ROOMS.STATUS status FROM ROOMS JOIN ROOM_TYPE USING (ROOM_TYPE_NO) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND ROOMS.STATUS = 'N'
SELECT ROOM_NO roomNo, THEME_NO themeNo, THEME_NAME themeName FROM ROOMS JOIN ROOMS_THEME USING (ROOM_NO) JOIN THEME USING (THEME_NO) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
SELECT ROOM_NO roomNo, ORIGIN_NAME originName, CHANGE_NAME changeName, FILE_LEVEL fileLevel FROM ROOMS JOIN ROOM_IMG USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ROOMS SET ROOM_NAME = #{roomName}, ROOM_PRICE = #{roomPrice}, ROOM_DESC = #{roomDesc} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}
UPDATE ROOM_IMG SET ORIGIN_NAME = #{originName}, CHANGE_NAME = #{changeName}, MODIFY_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND FILE_LEVEL = #{fileLevel}
UPDATE ROOMS SET STATUS = 'Y' WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND STATUS = 'N'
